"Setting Traps": "Traps are a Ranger skill. It sets a timed trap on the battlefield to catch enemies in the blast."
"Once you set a trap, a timer appears above. The countdown begins from the moment a trap is set."
"Once the timer ends, the trap detonates. The trap can also be detonated at any time by pressing <%SubPalette>. The range and effect of the explosion depend on the type of trap you set."
"To use a trap, you must learn the corresponding Ranger trap skill. Use traps to turn the tables when you're in a jam."
